code: import React from'react';import'../styles/Features.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Features=()=>{const features=[{icon:'barcode',title:'Instant Scanning',description:'Quickly scan any product barcode with our advanced camera technology'},{icon:'globe',title:'Country Origin',description:'Instantly discover the country of origin for any product'},{icon:'language',title:'Multi-language',description:'Supports multiple languages for a global user experience'},{icon:'bolt',title:'Fast & Accurate',description:'Lightning-fast results with high accuracy'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{id:"features",className:"features",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Key Features"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"feature-grid",children:features.map((feature,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"feature-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-".concat(feature.icon)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:feature.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:feature.description})]},index))})]});};export default Features;
